macLinuxSetupScript.value:
[concat('#!/bin/bash
# Copilot Agent 365 - Mac/Linux Setup Script with Python 3.11
# Save this as setup.sh and run: bash setup.sh

set -e

# Colors for output
RED="\033[0;31m"
GREEN="\033[0;32m"
YELLOW="\033[1;33m"
CYAN="\033[0;36m"
NC="\033[0m"

echo -e "${CYAN}â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•—${NC}"
echo -e "${CYAN}â•‘   Copilot Agent 365 - Mac/Linux Setup (3.11)  â•‘${NC}"
echo -e "${CYAN}â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•${NC}"
echo

# Function to check command exists
command_exists() {
    command -v "$1" >/dev/null 2>&1
}

# Function to check Python version
check_python_version() {
    local cmd=$1
    if command_exists $cmd; then
        local version=$($cmd --version 2>&1 | grep -oE "[0-9]+\.[0-9]+" | head -1)
        local major=$(echo $version | cut -d. -f1)
        local minor=$(echo $version | cut -d. -f2)
        # Only accept Python 3.9 through 3.11 for Azure Functions v4
        if [ "$major" -eq 3 ] && [ "$minor" -ge 9 ] && [ "$minor" -le 11 ]; then
            echo $cmd
            return 0
        fi
    fi
    return 1
}

# Check for Python (3.9 to 3.11 only)
echo -e "${YELLOW}â–¶ Checking prerequisites...${NC}"
MISSING=""
PYTHON_CMD=""
PYTHON_VERSION=""

# Try different Python commands, preferring 3.11
for cmd in python3.11 python3.10 python3.9 python3 python; do
    if result=$(check_python_version $cmd); then
        PYTHON_CMD=$result
        PYTHON_VERSION=$($cmd --version 2>&1 | grep -oE "[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+")
        break
    fi
done

if [ -z "$PYTHON_CMD" ]; then
    MISSING="${MISSING}\n  - Python 3.9-3.11 (Azure Functions requirement)\n    Mac: brew install python@3.11\n    Ubuntu/Debian: sudo apt-get install python3.11\n    RHEL/CentOS: sudo yum install python311\n    Or download from: python.org/downloads/release/python-3119/"
else
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ“ Found Python $PYTHON_VERSION (Azure Functions compatible)${NC}"
fi

# Check for Git
if ! command_exists git; then
    MISSING="${MISSING}\n  - Git (install: brew install git OR apt-get install git)"
else
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ“ Found Git${NC}"
fi

# Check for Node.js and npm
if ! command_exists node; then
    MISSING="${MISSING}\n  - Node.js (install: brew install node OR download from nodejs.org)"
else
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ“ Found Node.js$(node --version)${NC}"
fi

# Check for Azure Functions Core Tools
if ! command_exists func; then
    MISSING="${MISSING}\n  - Azure Functions Core Tools (run: npm install -g azure-functions-core-tools@4)"
else
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ“ Found Azure Functions Core Tools${NC}"
fi

# Check for Azure CLI (optional but recommended)
if ! command_exists az; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}âš  Azure CLI not found (optional for deployment)${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}  Mac: brew install azure-cli${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}  Linux: curl -sL https://aka.ms/InstallAzureCLIDeb | sudo bash${NC}"
else
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ“ Found Azure CLI${NC}"
fi

if [ ! -z "$MISSING" ]; then
    echo -e "${RED}Missing prerequisites:${MISSING}${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}Install missing tools and run this script again${NC}"
    exit 1
fi

echo -e "${GREEN}âœ“ All prerequisites found${NC}"

# Clone or update repository
echo -e "${YELLOW}â–¶ Setting up project...${NC}"
if [ -d "Copilot-Agent-365" ]; then
    cd Copilot-Agent-365
    git pull
else
    git clone https://github.com/kody-w/Copilot-Agent-365.git
    cd Copilot-Agent-365
fi

# Create local.settings.json with actual Azure values from deployment
echo -e "${YELLOW}â–¶ Creating configuration...${NC}"
cat > local.settings.json << EOF
{
  "IsEncrypted": false,
  "Values": {
    "AzureWebJobsStorage": "', concat('DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName=', parameters('storageAccountName'), ';EndpointSuffix=', environment().suffixes.storage, ';AccountKey=',listKeys(variables('storageAccountId'), '2022-09-01').keys[0].value), '",
    "FUNCTIONS_WORKER_RUNTIME": "python",
    "AZURE_OPENAI_API_KEY": "', listKeys(variables('openAIResourceId'), '2023-05-01').key1, '",
    "AZURE_OPENAI_ENDPOINT": "', reference(variables('openAIResourceId')).endpoint, '",
    "AZURE_OPENAI_API_VERSION": "2024-02-01",
    "AZURE_OPENAI_DEPLOYMENT_NAME": "gpt-deployment",
    "AZURE_FILES_SHARE_NAME": "', variables('fileShareName'), '",
    "ASSISTANT_NAME": "Copilot Agent 365",
    "CHARACTERISTIC_DESCRIPTION": "Enterprise AI assistant integrated with Microsoft 365"
  }
}
EOF
echo -e "${GREEN}âœ“ Configuration created with your Azure deployment values${NC}"

# Deploy to Azure if az CLI is available
if command_exists az; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}â–¶ Deploying code to Azure...${NC}"
    zip -r deploy.zip . -x "*.git*" -x ".venv/*" -x "local.settings.json" > /dev/null 2>&1
    az functionapp deployment source config-zip --resource-group "', resourceGroup().name, '" --name "', parameters('functionAppName'), '" --src deploy.zip
    rm deploy.zip
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ“ Code deployed to Azure${NC}"
else
    echo -e "${YELLOW}âš  Skipping Azure deployment (Azure CLI not installed)${NC}"
fi

# Setup Python environment
echo -e "${YELLOW}â–¶ Setting up Python environment...${NC}"
rm -rf .venv 2>/dev/null || true
$PYTHON_CMD -m venv .venv

# Activate virtual environment
if [ -f ".venv/bin/activate" ]; then
    source .venv/bin/activate
else
    source .venv/Scripts/activate
fi

pip install --upgrade pip > /dev/null 2>&1

# Install packages with fixed versions for compatibility
if [ -f "requirements.txt" ]; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}â–¶ Installing from requirements.txt...${NC}"
    pip install -r requirements.txt
else
    echo -e "${YELLOW}â–¶ Installing packages (Python 3.9-3.11 compatible)...${NC}"
    pip install openai==1.55.3
    pip install httpx==0.27.2
    pip install azure-functions==1.18.0
    pip install azure-storage-file==2.1.0
    pip install pydantic==1.10.13
fi

echo -e "${GREEN}âœ“ Python environment ready${NC}"

# Create run script
cat > run.sh << RUNSCRIPT
#!/bin/bash
if [ -f ".venv/bin/activate" ]; then
    source .venv/bin/activate
else
    source .venv/Scripts/activate
fi
echo "Starting Copilot Agent 365..."
echo "Local URL: http://localhost:7071/api/businessinsightbot_function"
echo "Press Ctrl+C to stop"
func start
RUNSCRIPT
chmod +x run.sh

# Complete!
echo
echo -e "${GREEN}â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”${NC}"
echo -e "${GREEN}âœ¨ Setup Complete! Bot deployed and ready! âœ¨${NC}"
echo -e "${GREEN}   Using Python $PYTHON_VERSION (Azure compatible)${NC}"
echo -e "${GREEN}â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”${NC}"
echo
echo -e "${CYAN}Azure Function URL:${NC}"
echo "  https://', reference(variables('functionAppId')).defaultHostName, '/api/businessinsightbot_function?code=', listkeys(concat(resourceId('Microsoft.Web/sites', parameters('functionAppName')), '/host/default'), '2022-03-01').functionKeys.default, '"
echo
echo -e "${CYAN}To run locally:${NC}"
echo "  ./run.sh"
echo
echo -e "${CYAN}Test command:${NC}"
echo "  curl -X POST http://localhost:7071/api/businessinsightbot_function \\"
echo "    -H \"Content-Type: application/json\" \\"
echo "    -d {\"user_input\": \"Hello\", \"conversation_history\": []}"
echo
echo -e "${YELLOW}Would you like to start the local server now? (y/n)${NC}"
read -r START_NOW
if [ "$START_NOW" = "y" ] || [ "$START_NOW" = "Y" ]; then
    ./run.sh
fi
')]
